Module NasaAPODGui
Package sample

Class APOD

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.APOD
  • public class APOD
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1 A Class that represents a Nasa Astronomy of the Day (APOD) Object. The object has a URL link to the APOD image, an explanation of the APOD image, the APOD title and the APOD author. The APOD object is initialised with the date of the request APOD and retrieve the APOD information using a HTTP request. The response can then be parsed and queried on demand.
    Author:
    Andrew White

    • Method Detail

      • createURL

        public void createURL()
        Creates the URL to request the APOD information. First builds a string using the base baseApiCallString, pictureDate, isHD and keyGen. Then creates a URL with the string URL and references it to apiCall.

      • makeAPIcall

        public void makeAPIcall()
        Performs an HTTP request to the apiCall address and saves the response

      • parseResponse

        public void parseResponse()
                   throws VideoException
        Throws:
        VideoException - Take the http response and extract the key information

      • getApodAuthor

        public java.lang.String getApodAuthor()
        Returns:
        The author of the APOD image, if there is one

      • getApodExplanation

        public java.lang.String getApodExplanation()
        Returns:
        A string with the APOD image explanation

      • getApodURLImage

        public java.lang.String getApodURLImage()

        The title of the APOD image

      • getApodURL

        public java.net.URL getApodURL()
